Name: Penny for Your Thoughts
About the game: After spending several years as a private investigator, Penny is informed that she has broken too many rules and must give up her business. Determined to continue her work, she finds a new way to continue helping those in need. But when her past comes back to haunt her, will she be able to resist falling to despair? Penny for Your Thoughts is a spinoff following Penny from the visual novel Avalon. It is not required to have played Avalon to understand and enjoy Penny for Your Thoughts. This is a short visual novel that will only take 1 - 2 hours to complete.
